description: Distance to the closest accessible and functioning road suitable for cars (in minutes).
How would the farmer rate the stability of the household income over time?

factor: Percentage of income spent on food
description: In the past 7 days, what percentage of the household's income was used to buy food?
Number of years the household has been farming this land.
To what extent does the household contribute to decision-making in managing the community's land and natural resources?

factor: Power and freedom to solve problems collectively
description: How far does the farmer agree with the statement: If I work together with others in my community, we have power and freedom to solve problems facing farmers.

factor: Number of ecological practices for pest management
description: Number of ecological pest management practices used on the farm in the last 12 months.
How effective does the farmer perceive associations or organizations are in supporting business ventures?
Does the household earn enough income from farming to support the family?
Total area of monoculture perennial crops on the farm.
